title: Is there any point to ranked ATM
body: Just wanted to know because all the seasonal rewards have been given if there is any reason to play ranked over normals. Eg. If I get gold before end of season 5 will there be a gold boarder for me in season 6. Let me know please. Thanks

replies.body: also keeps ur mechanics and game sense level with ur elo

Basically when next season rolls around your rank is reset and your mmr has a soft reset. Say you were gold III this season, then next season if you won most of your placements you'd get placed around GV (as I understand it, basically it drops you a little lower). If you were to play ranked in preseason and bump your rank up to Plat V, you wouldn't get a plat border or anything but winning those placements would drop you closer to GII~. Basically preseason ranked is a low risk (since you don't lose rewards and your rank gets reset) way to make sure you have less to climb next season.
we dont get a gold border, but it does affect where you will be placed next season
